price: 1. Waxaa xurmo weyneeya oo (xumaan ka) hufa Alle Waxa ku sugan samooyinka iyo arlada2. Waana Adkaadaha, Xikmadda Badan.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
footnotes:
1. Xadiid: Birta.
 2. Iyagoo ammaana oo caddeeya inuu ka hufan yahay xumaan oo dhan 
oo uusan laheyn xaas, ilmo, iyo shariig.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
